name: Bay Area Women of Flatiron School : Alumni Panel
content: Join the Women of Flatiron School for an evening of honest conversation about their successes and challenges during their time at Flatiron, and learn where they are now as working professionals in the Bay Area. Alumnae will speak on their non technical backgrounds prior to Flatiron School, what studying in person and online are like, and what aspects to consider when deciding what to study, all designed to help you confidently decide how to take the next step in your career. Panelists: Koren C, Product Manager at Facebook (Software Engineering, In Person) Sophia H., Software Engineer at Stitch Fix (Software Engineering, Online) Schedule 5:15- 6PM Check in, Apps + Drinks 6:00-7:00PM Panel, Q/A 7-8PM Open Networking, Meet the Flatiron SF team Time: 5:30 pm - 8:00 pm Venue details: WeWork, 353 Sacramento Street, San Francisco 94111, United States
